channel.title: Re : xlog
channel.description: can i make a command evrytime somone xloges it yells (playername has xloged) thanks.

item.title: Re : xlog
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

Powerknite7, a moderator doesn’t HAVE to tell who broke a rule and who didn’t.
I was warned a week ago, so what? You were too.
I earned my points too, I don’t beg for them like you begged me to rep you.
Learn what flaming is? I simply told you that you’re breaking a rule.

We only have 1 account per person.[/quote]

item.title: Re : xlog
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“HSRPXX, post:2, topic:280121”]xLog, Isn’t that like when they login after dieing?

I suppose after death, you could add a

if logout); 500000ms
sendMessage;(+playername+ has xlogged);

that was rough, And wont work. But you get the idea. If they logout within 5seconds, I think thats 500000ms they are attempting to xlog after death.[/quote]

5 seconds is 5000 ms.

Read full topic
